summary: Reupload of the Lollipop Axe i made since it was requested. i initially deleted this since I didn\'t want it to just be a replacing mod and want to wait till the CK to make it a non-replacer
descriptionHtml:
Reupload of the Lollipop Axe i made since it was requested. i initially deleted this since I didn\'t want it to just be a replacing mod and want to wait till the CK to make it a non-replacer 

Replacement for Daedric Waraxe


Dont like it dont download it, no need to complain.

Steam Directory -> steamapps -> common -> skyrim -> Data

Uninstall
Just Delete the folder from the data folder it was saved in.
author: shigglebigglebah
